item.title: I need help changing my backround!
item.dc:creator: @Trade_Me Trade Me
item.description:
@Trade_Me wrote:

Change it back to Background.png…
Then find the Background file, And OVERWRITE that background with the same amount of pixels and everything with your selected picture, Make sure the picture isnt bigger than the older picture, If it is, That may be the problem… On some clients they cant have a bigger pixel width…

Try answering my question:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic
item.source: I need help changing my backround!

item.title: I need help changing my backround!
item.dc:creator: @reyes2303 reyes2303
item.description:
@reyes2303 wrote:

Ok so the background on my client isn’t great so I made a new one. But the problem is i cannot add it to my client. It’s a PI and I do not have a sprites folder. I have a sprite .txt file which says f(client.normalLogin == true) { //Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(abyte0); Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(location+"Background.png"); MediaTracker mediatracker = new MediaTracker(component); mediatracker.addImage(image, 0); mediatracker.waitForAll(); myWidth = image.getWidth(component); myHeight = image.getHeight(component); maxWidth = myWidth; maxHeight = myHeight; anInt1442 = 0; anInt1443 = 0; myPixels = new int[myWidth * myHeight]; PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, myWidth, myHeight, myPixels, 0, myWidth); pixelgrabber.grabPixels(); } else if(client.normalLogin == false) { Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(location+"Background.png"); MediaTracker mediatracker = new MediaTracker(component); mediatracker.addImage(image, 0); mediatracker.waitForAll(); myWidth = image.getWidth(component); myHeight = image.getHeight(component); maxWidth = myWidth; maxHeight = myHeight; anInt1442 = 0; anInt1443 = 0; myPixels = new int[myWidth * myHeight]; PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, myWidth, myHeight, myPixels, 0, myWidth); pixelgrabber.grabPixels(); } } catch(Exception _ex) { System.out.println("Error converting jpg"); } }
And obviously I change where it says “background.png” to my file name. I save and compile fine. The problem is when I run my client it gives the black screen you get when you refresh a webclient if you know what I mean. I just don’t know how to change it! Can anyone help?

Read full topic
item.source: I need help changing my backround!
